doc:
Ken Thorley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ken_Thorley 0 Ken Thorley is an actor who has portrayed various characters in television and film. One of his recurring roles was that of the fictional character "Mot", a Bolian barber on the U.S.S. Enterprise-D on Star Trek: The Next Generation (who was also portrayed by Shelly Desai). He also played a seaman in another episode of ST:TNG. Ken_Thorley is an_actor who has_portrayed various_characters in television_and_film . One of his_recurring_roles was that of the_fictional_character_"_Mot_" , a_Bolian_barber on the_U.S.S._Enterprise-D on Star_Trek : The_Next_Generation ( who was_also_portrayed by Shelly_Desai_) . He also played a_seaman in another_episode of ST : TNG .
